title: I got the project leona skinshard
body: But i misclicked activate because all of the options are close together in a small window. I had everything to make it permanent, and even bought leona because i didnt have her, can you please help me. (I could have used the IP for kled, but now i no has and ii no has project leo :~:)

replies.body:
OH NO, THAT'S TERRIBLE!! :'(

I'm a Leona main and her PROJECT skin is my absolute favorite, so I can understand the heartache you're feeling right now. I really wish there was something we could do, but unfortunately, because you're given two confirmations before you rent a skin, we cannot undo the rental.

Each rental gets a final confirmation with this button:

(click to enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/o9NRR

So in the future, I recommend to double check the button before you press it. I'm sorry I wasn't able to turn back time like Ekko, but please let me know if you have any questions.

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4ajmr8/does_using_the_7day_rental_on_skin_shards_in/

im not the only one who has been confused by/tripped up by the way the current system works

I dont remember there being any confirmation (I mean it is still a relatively new system, surely there is some understanding that your confirmation could have some more clarity, or that you could optimize how the initial options menu looks/works), and i am being honest here. I mean why would i waste an entire skin shard that was super valuable on a temporary trial? and why would that consume it? As a suggestion I would say that trialing a skin shard shouldnt destroy it . . . .
Im sadistic so it made me giggle, but overall #FeelsBad.
